fields.name: Eiffel Tower
fields.description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.
fields.best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October

fields.name: Santorini
fields.description: Santorini is one of the Cyclades islands in the Aegean Sea. It was devastated by a volcanic eruption in the 16th century BC, forever shaping its rugged landscape.
fields.best_time_to_visit: April to May, September to October

fields.name: Grand Canyon
fields.description: The Grand Canyon is a steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona, United States. The Grand Canyon is 277 miles long, up to 18 miles wide and attains a depth of over a mile.
fields.best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November

fields.name: Kyoto
fields.description: Kyoto, once the capital of Japan, is a city on the island of Honshu. It's famous for its numerous classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, Shinto shrines and traditional wooden houses.
fields.best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November

fields.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
fields.description: Notre-Dame Cathedral is a medieval Catholic cathedral on the Île de la Cité in Paris, France. The cathedral is widely considered to be one of the finest examples of French Gothic architecture.
fields.best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October

fields.name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
fields.description: The Arashiyama Bamboo Grove is one of Kyoto's top attractions and for good reason: standing amid these soaring stalks of bamboo is like being in another world.
fields.best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November

fields.name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
fields.description: Kinkaku-ji, officially named Rokuon-ji, is a Zen Buddhist temple in Kyoto, Japan. The top two floors of the pavilion are covered with pure gold leaf, creating a stunning reflection on the pond below.
fields.best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November
